name: VCO - Pulsar
description: A pulsar VCO implementing pulsar synthesis. Two pitch inputs (fundamental + formant). Uses wavetables from the SD card and provides a main and inverse output.

parameters.name: Wavetable
parameters.description: Chooses the wavetable.

parameters.name: Wave offset
parameters.description: Sets the position within the wavetable.

parameters.name: Window
parameters.description: Window applied to the pulsarets.

parameters.name: Pitch mode
parameters.description: Whether formant frequency is independent or tracks the fundamental.

parameters.name: Masking mode
parameters.description: Masking mode for pulsarets.

parameters.name: Masking
parameters.description: Amount of masking when enabled.

parameters.name: Burst length
parameters.description: Burst length when masking mode is Burst.

parameters.name: Octave
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in octaves.

parameters.name: Transpose
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in semitones.

parameters.name: Fine tune
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in cents.

parameters.name: Amplitude
parameters.description: Amplitude of the output before gain.

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: Level of the output.

parameters.name: Pitch input
parameters.description: The pitch CV input (1V/octave).

parameters.name: Formant input
parameters.description: The formant CV input (1V/octave).

parameters.name: Wave input
parameters.description: Input bus to modulate the wave offset.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: The output bus.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the main output.

parameters.name: Inverse output
parameters.description: The output bus with inverse masking.

parameters.name: Inverse output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the inverse output.
